PsTXSiytnts.title: 23 MAJOR Smart Home Announcements To Kick Off 2024!
PsTXSiytnts.author: Automate Your Life
PsTXSiytnts.description:
Tucked away behind all the gear and gadgets were some major announcements for your smart home at CES 2024! This is what we found from the biggest players (and some of your favorites) from the world of smart homes and home automation.

We hope you enjoy all the latest smart home news, updates, and more from CES 2024! Note that our video includes some new ways that Google Home can be controlled, new ways to manage your home's energy with Samsung SmartThings, new and cool smart home gadgets, a brand new way to cast your Netflix session, and AI and AR announcements like the new Rabbit R1.

Timecodes for today's video:
00:00 - The Smart Home News
0:28 - LG Loves Google Home
1:22 - Your TV is a Smart Home Hub
2:25 - SmartThings With Tesla
2:43 - AI Smart Lighting Has Arrived
4:09 - Unique New Smart Home Gadgets
6:30 - A Surprise Smart Home Company
7:28 - Fire TVs Get Casting
8:14 - AI Was Everywhere
9:16 - AR Is Still Weird
10:28 - Smart Home Hubs Updated
11:39 - Big Standards Changing
12:25 - Did Matter Just Get Fixed

Join this channel to get access to extra videos, early releases, and other perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtRSKEipM17PF7n0mi66btQ/join

Subscribe to Take The Frustration Out Of Automation: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtRSKEipM17PF7n0mi66btQ?sub_confirmation=1
